{"id":299653855,"lang":"python3","time":"1 year, 4 months","timestamp":1580675813,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"48 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/299653855/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Trapping Rain Water","memory":"13.4 MB","code":"class Solution:\n    def trap(self, height) -> int:\n        \"\"\"O(n) time and space\"\"\"\n        maxh = 0\n        forward_trap = [0] * len(height)\n        for i, h in enumerate(height):\n            maxh = max(maxh, h)\n            forward_trap[i] = maxh - h\n        trapped = 0\n        maxh = 0\n        for i in range(len(height)-1, -1, -1):\n            h = height[i]\n            maxh = max(maxh, h)\n            trapped += min(forward_trap[i], (maxh - h))\n        return trapped","compare_result":"","title_slug":"trapping-rain-water"}
